PVIN.name: PVIN
PVIN.description: Input voltage for power stage. Connect to power supply with ceramic bypass capacitors. The path from PVIN to high-frequency bypass capacitors and PGND must be as short as possible. Absolute maximum: -0.3V to +28V referenced to PGND. Recommended operating range: 4.5V to 20V.
PVIN.connectivity_instructions: Connect to input supply. Place ceramic capacitors as close to PVIN and PGND pins as possible for best decoupling effect. Use different values/packages of ceramic capacitors (e.g., 1210 and 0603) to cover entire decoupling spectrum. Smaller capacitance values should be placed closer to device PVIN pins for better high-frequency noise absorption.
PVIN.design_precautions: Ensure low-inductance connection to input supply. Critical high-current path.

PHASE.name: PHASE
PHASE.description: Phase node, return path of high side gate driver. This is the high-side FET source connection. Absolute maximum: -0.3V to +28V DC, -8V to +33V AC (100ns) referenced to PGND.
PHASE.connectivity_instructions: Connect to switching node / output inductor. This node switches between PVIN and PGND.
PHASE.design_precautions: High dV/dt node - minimize trace area to reduce EMI.

GH.name: GH
GH.description: High side MOSFET gate monitor. This pin provides the gate drive signal for the internal high-side MOSFET and can be used for monitoring.
GH.connectivity_instructions: Typically left unconnected. May be used for gate drive monitoring/debugging if needed.

BOOT.name: BOOT
BOOT.description: Bootstrap voltage for high side gate driver (referenced to PHASE). Connect a ceramic capacitor from BOOT to SW/PHASE node. Absolute maximum: -0.3V to VPH + PVCC; BOOT to SW: -0.3V to +6V.
BOOT.connectivity_instructions: Connect a ceramic capacitor from BOOT to the SW/PHASE node. This capacitor provides charge for the high-side gate driver.
BOOT.design_precautions: Place bootstrap capacitor close to IC. Ensure capacitor can handle voltage stress.

AGND.name: AGND
AGND.description: Analog signal return ground. Return for internal voltage reference and analog circuits. Absolute maximum: -0.3V to +0.3V relative to PGND.
AGND.connectivity_instructions: Connect to circuit ground plane. This is the reference for analog and control circuits.
AGND.design_precautions: Keep AGND and PGND connected at a single point near the IC to prevent ground loops and noise coupling.

NC_8.name: NC
NC_8.connectivity_instructions: Leave unconnected or connect to ground.

NC_9.name: NC
NC_9.connectivity_instructions: Leave unconnected or connect to ground.

NC_10.name: NC
NC_10.connectivity_instructions: Leave unconnected or connect to ground.

VSEN_MINUS.name: VSEN-
VSEN_MINUS.description: Remote sense amplifier negative input. Connect to output ground at load point for accurate output voltage regulation. Common mode range: -200mV to +200mV.
VSEN_MINUS.connectivity_instructions: Connect directly to the output ground at the point of load. Used for differential remote sensing of output voltage.
VSEN_MINUS.design_precautions: Route sense traces as a differential pair close together to reject common-mode noise. Keep trace impedance low.

VSEN_PLUS.name: VSEN+
VSEN_PLUS.description: Remote sense amplifier positive input. Connect to output voltage at load point for accurate regulation. Common mode range: -0.2V to 12V.
VSEN_PLUS.connectivity_instructions: Connect directly to the output voltage at the point of load. Used for differential remote sensing of output voltage.
VSEN_PLUS.design_precautions: Route sense traces as a differential pair close together with VSEN-. Do not route near high-current or noisy traces.

PGOOD.name: PGOOD
PGOOD.description: Power good; open-drain output indicating VOUT is within set limits. Default rising threshold: 90% of VOUT, falling threshold: 85% of VOUT, hysteresis: 5%. On resistance: 5.5Ω typical. Rising delay: 25µs typical, falling delay: 100µs typical.
PGOOD.connected_components: Pull-up resistor (10kΩ typical) to VDD or external logic supply
PGOOD.connectivity_instructions: Connect a pull-up resistor (typically 10kΩ) to VDD or external logic supply up to 5V. Signal goes high when output voltage is within regulation limits.
PGOOD.design_precautions: Open-drain output requires external pull-up. Thresholds can be adjusted via POWER_GOOD_ON (5Eh) and POWER_GOOD_OFF (5Fh) PMBus commands.

ADDR.name: ADDR
ADDR.description: PMBus address programming pin. Connect a resistor to AGND to set PMBus address offset (0 to 14). Up to 15 different addresses can be set allowing 15 SiC45x devices with unique addresses in a single system. Absolute maximum: -0.3V to VDD + 0.3V.
ADDR.connected_components: Address setting resistor to AGND (0.845kΩ to 11kΩ per address table)
ADDR.connectivity_instructions: Connect a resistor from ADDR pin to AGND to set PMBus address offset. Resistor values: 0.845kΩ=offset 0, 1.3kΩ=offset 1, 1.78kΩ=offset 2, 2.32kΩ=offset 3, 2.87kΩ=offset 4, 3.48kΩ=offset 5, 4.12kΩ=offset 6, 4.75kΩ=offset 7, 5.49kΩ=offset 8, 6.19kΩ=offset 9, 6.98kΩ=offset 10, 7.87kΩ=offset 11, 8.87kΩ=offset 12, 10kΩ=offset 13, 11kΩ=offset 14.
ADDR.design_precautions: Do not leave open or short. Use 1% tolerance resistor for accurate address setting.

VSET.name: VSET
VSET.description: Output voltage set point by connecting a resistor from VSET to AGND. Also affects PMBus base address selection. If VSET is shorted or connected via resistor, MFR_BASE_ADDRESS (D7h) is used; if floating, MFR_BASE_ADDRESS_2 (E2h) is used. Absolute maximum: -0.3V to VDD + 0.3V.
VSET.connected_components: Voltage setting resistor to AGND (0.845kΩ to 11kΩ per table)
VSET.connectivity_instructions: Connect a resistor from VSET to AGND to set default output voltage. Resistor values: 0.845kΩ=0.6V, 1.3kΩ=0.9V, 1.78kΩ=0.95V, 2.32kΩ=1.0V, 2.87kΩ=1.05V, 3.48kΩ=1.2V, 4.12kΩ=1.25V, 4.75kΩ=1.5V, 5.49kΩ=1.8V, 6.19kΩ=2.1V, 6.98kΩ=2.5V, 7.87kΩ=3.3V, 8.87kΩ=5.0V, 11kΩ=12V. If output voltage is set via PMBus, short VSET to AGND or leave open.
VSET.design_precautions: Use 1% tolerance resistor. Setting also affects warning/fault thresholds and VOUT_SCALE_LOOP.

RT_SYNC.name: RT/SYNC
RT_SYNC.description: Clock synchronization pin. Frequency can be set by connecting a resistor to AGND. Can be configured as master (outputs clock) or slave (receives clock) for synchronization. Logic high: 2V min, Logic low: 0.8V max. Minimum input pulse width: 100ns. Sync frequency range: 300kHz to 1500kHz.
RT_SYNC.connected_components: Frequency setting resistor to AGND, or sync signal connection
RT_SYNC.connectivity_instructions: Connect a resistor from RT/SYNC to AGND to set switching frequency. Resistor values: 0.845kΩ=300kHz, 1.3kΩ=400kHz, 1.78kΩ=500kHz, 2.32kΩ=550kHz, 2.87kΩ=600kHz, 3.48kΩ=650kHz, 4.12kΩ=700kHz, 4.75kΩ=750kHz, 5.49kΩ=800kHz, 6.19kΩ=850kHz, 6.98kΩ=900kHz, 7.87kΩ=950kHz, 8.87kΩ=1000kHz, 10kΩ=1250kHz, 11kΩ=1500kHz. For master/slave sync, connect to other SiC45x RT/SYNC pins.
RT_SYNC.design_precautions: Do not leave open or short. Frequency can be overridden via PMBus FREQUENCY_SWITCH (33h) command with 50kHz resolution.

SALRT.name: SALRT
SALRT.description: PMBus alert (SMBALERT#). Open-drain output for PMBus alert signaling. Connect to external host interface if desired. Asserted when warning or fault conditions occur.
SALRT.connected_components: Pull-up resistor to VDD or logic supply; connection to PMBus host SMBALERT# line
SALRT.connectivity_instructions: Connect to PMBus host SMBALERT# line with appropriate pull-up resistor. Multiple devices can share the same alert line (wired-OR).
SALRT.design_precautions: Open-drain output requires external pull-up. Alert sources can be masked via SMBALERT_MASK (1Bh) command.

SDA.name: SDA
SDA.description: PMBus data. Connect to external host interface. Supports SMBus/PMBus communication up to 1MHz bus speed. Input high: 2V min, Input low: 0.8V max. Input hysteresis: 0.1V typical. Pin capacitance: 5pF typical.
SDA.connected_components: Pull-up resistor (2.2kΩ to 10kΩ typical) to logic supply
SDA.connectivity_instructions: Connect to PMBus/SMBus SDA line. Requires external pull-up resistor to logic supply voltage.
SDA.design_precautions: Keep trace length short for high-speed communication. Supports packet error checking (PEC).

SCL.name: SCL
SCL.description: PMBus clock. Connect to external host interface. Supports bus speeds up to 1MHz. Input high: 2V min, Input low: 0.8V max. Input hysteresis: 0.1V typical. Pin capacitance: 5pF typical.
SCL.connected_components: Pull-up resistor (2.2kΩ to 10kΩ typical) to logic supply
SCL.connectivity_instructions: Connect to PMBus/SMBus SCL line. Requires external pull-up resistor to logic supply voltage.
SCL.design_precautions: Keep trace length short for high-speed communication.

EN.name: EN
EN.description: Enable pin. Active high 5V logic level input. Pull-down resistance: 5MΩ typical. When high, enables device operation; when low, device is disabled. Input high: 2V min, Input low: 0.8V max.
EN.connectivity_instructions: Connect to logic signal or resistor divider for enable control. Drive high to enable, low to disable. Can be connected to PVIN through resistor divider for UVLO functionality.
EN.design_precautions: No sequencing requirements with respect to input/output supplies. Enable behavior configurable via ON_OFF_CONFIG (02h) PMBus command.

VDD.name: VDD
VDD.description: Internal 5V circuits supply voltage. VDD is an LDO output from the internal regulator. Operating range: 4.5V to 5.5V (4.75V to 5.25V recommended). UVLO threshold rising: 4.10V typical, 4.26V max; falling: 3.84V min, 4.00V typical. Standby current: 0.9mA typical, 1.3mA max. Sleep current: 17µA typical, 24µA max.
VDD.connectivity_instructions: Connect a 1µF ceramic decoupling capacitor from VDD to AGND, placed close to the IC.
VDD.design_precautions: Do not externally drive this pin. This is an LDO output that supplies internal digital and analog circuits.

VIN.name: VIN
VIN.description: Internal driver supply voltage. Used to implement on-time of COT control. VIN shall be directly connected to PVIN. Absolute maximum: -0.3V to +28V referenced to PGND.
VIN.connectivity_instructions: Connect directly to PVIN. Place a decoupling capacitor close to this pin. VIN is the input pin for both internal LDO and tON block - tON time varies based on input voltage.
VIN.design_precautions: This pin is critical for proper COT control timing. Ensure clean, low-noise connection to PVIN.

PVCC.name: PVCC
PVCC.description: Supply voltage for internal gate drive. PVCC is an LDO output. Operating range: 4.5V to 5.5V (4.75V to 5.25V recommended). UVLO threshold: 3.4V min, 3.6V typical, 3.8V max. Hysteresis: 300mV typical.
PVCC.connectivity_instructions: Connect a 4.7µF ceramic decoupling capacitor from PVCC to PGND, placed close to the IC.
PVCC.design_precautions: Do not externally drive this pin. This LDO output provides power for the internal gate drivers. Capacitor should be placed close to filter noise and provide maximum instantaneous driver current during switching.

GL.name: GL
GL.description: Low side MOSFET gate monitor. This pin provides the gate drive signal for the internal low-side MOSFET and can be used for monitoring.
GL.connectivity_instructions: Typically left unconnected. May be used for gate drive monitoring/debugging if needed.

SW.name: SW
SW.description: Switch node. Output of internal power MOSFETs. Connect to output inductor. Internally connected to both power MOSFETs (high-side and low-side). Absolute maximum: -0.3V to +28V DC, -8V to +33V AC (100ns) referenced to PGND.
SW.connectivity_instructions: Connect to output inductor with large copper plane to lower resistance. If any snubber network is required, place components on the bottom side of PCB.
SW.design_precautions: High dV/dt switching node - minimize trace area to reduce EMI and ringing. Keep connection to inductor short and wide.

PGND.name: PGND
PGND.description: Power ground. Common return for internal MOSFETs. High-current ground return path.
PGND.connectivity_instructions: Connect to ground plane. This is the high-current return path for the power stage. The path from PVIN through decoupling capacitors to PGND must be as short as possible.
PGND.design_precautions: Use wide, low-inductance traces. Connect PGND and AGND at a single point near the IC.

fields.name: ON_OFF
fields.description: PMBus unit output control. 0 = Output is disabled, 1 = Output is enabled.

fields.name: OFF_B
fields.description: Off behavior control. 0 = Output turned off immediately, power off sequence commands ignored. 1 = Regulator turns off following TOFF_DELAY and TOFF_FALL commands.

digital_physical_map.0: Output turned off immediately, power off sequence commands ignored
digital_physical_map.1: Regulator turns off following TOFF_DELAY and TOFF_FALL commands

fields.name: MARGIN
fields.description: Output voltage margin selection. 00 = VOUT set by VOUT_COMMAND, 01 = VOUT set by VOUT_MARGIN_LOW, 10 = VOUT set by VOUT_MARGIN_HIGH.

fields.name: MRGNFLT
fields.description: Margin fault response. 00 = Not supported, 01 = Faults from margin ignored, 10 = Faults from margin acted upon per fault response settings.

digital_physical_map.1: Faults caused by margin selection are ignored
digital_physical_map.2: Faults caused by margin selection are acted upon according to fault response settings

fields.name: PU
fields.description: Power up behavior. 0 = Powers up any time power is present, 1 = Does not power up until commanded by EN pin and OPERATION command.

digital_physical_map.0: Regulator powers up any time power is present regardless of EN pin state
digital_physical_map.1: Regulator does not power up until commanded by EN pin and OPERATION command

fields.name: CMD
fields.description: OPERATION command enable. 0 = Ignores 'on' bit in OPERATION command, 1 = Responds to 'on' bit in OPERATION command.

digital_physical_map.0: Regulator ignores the 'on' bit in OPERATION command
digital_physical_map.1: Regulator responds to the 'on' bit in OPERATION command

fields.name: EN
fields.description: EN pin enable. 0 = Ignores EN pin, 1 = Requires EN pin asserted to start.

digital_physical_map.0: Regulator ignores EN pin, controlled only by OPERATION command
digital_physical_map.1: Regulator requires EN pin to be asserted to start

fields.name: ENPOL
fields.description: EN pin polarity. 0 = Active low, 1 = Active high.

fields.name: OFFB1
fields.description: EN turn-off behavior. 0 = Turns off following TOFF_DELAY and TOFF_FALL, 1 = Turns off immediately.

digital_physical_map.0: Regulator turns off following tOFF_DELAY and tOFF_FALL when EN used to turn off

fields.name: WTPRT
fields.description: Write protect configuration. 000 = Enable writes to all commands, 100 = Disable all writes except WRITE_PROTECT, 010 = Disable all writes except WRITE_PROTECT and OPERATION, 001 = Disable all writes except WRITE_PROTECT, OPERATION, ON_OFF_CONFIG and VOUT_COMMAND.

digital_physical_map.4: Disable all writes except to WRITE_PROTECT command
digital_physical_map.2: Disable all writes except to WRITE_PROTECT and OPERATION commands
digital_physical_map.1: Disable all writes except to WRITE_PROTECT, OPERATION, ON_OFF_CONFIG and VOUT_COMMAND

fields.name: PEC
fields.description: Packet error checking support. 1 = Supported.

fields.name: SPD
fields.description: Maximum supported bus speed. 10 = 1 MHz.

fields.name: ALRT
fields.description: ALERT# pin support. 1 = Unit has ALERT# pin and supports PMBus alert response protocol.

fields.name: VOUT_COMMAND
fields.description: Output voltage command. Sets target output voltage. LINEAR16 format with exponent -9. Resolution: 1.953mV. Range: 0.3V to 14V.

fields.name: FREQUENCY_SWITCH
fields.description: Switching frequency setting. LINEAR11 format. Resolution: 50kHz. Range: 300kHz to 1500kHz.

digital_physical_map.-1: Frequency in kHz using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: INTERLEAVE_MODE
fields.description: Synchronization mode setting. Bits [11:8] set master/slave mode.

fields.name: IOUT_OC_FAULT_LIMIT
fields.description: Output overcurrent fault limit. LINEAR11 format. Resolution: 0.5A. Range: 0A to 127A. Default varies by part: SiC450=56A, SiC451=35A, SiC453=21A.

digital_physical_map.-1: OC fault limit in Amps using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: OT_FAULT_LIMIT
fields.description: Overtemperature fault limit. LINEAR11 format. Resolution: 1°C. Range: 0°C to 150°C. Default: 125°C.

digital_physical_map.-1: Temperature fault limit in °C using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: VIN_ON
fields.description: Input voltage turn-on threshold. LINEAR11 format. Resolution: 0.5V. Range: 1V to 80V. Default: 10V.

digital_physical_map.-1: VIN turn-on threshold in Volts using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: VIN_OFF
fields.description: Input voltage turn-off threshold. LINEAR11 format. Resolution: 0.5V. Range: 1V to 80V. Default: 9V.

digital_physical_map.-1: VIN turn-off threshold in Volts using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: TON_DELAY
fields.description: Turn-on delay time. LINEAR11 format. Resolution: 1ms. Range: 0ms to 127ms. Default: 0ms.

digital_physical_map.-1: Turn-on delay in ms using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: TON_RISE
fields.description: Turn-on rise time (soft-start). LINEAR11 format. Resolution: 1ms. Range: 0ms to 127ms. Default: 5ms.

digital_physical_map.-1: Soft-start rise time in ms using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: TOFF_DELAY
fields.description: Turn-off delay time. LINEAR11 format. Resolution: 1ms. Range: 0ms to 127ms. Default: 0ms.

digital_physical_map.-1: Turn-off delay in ms using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: TOFF_FALL
fields.description: Turn-off fall time (soft-stop). LINEAR11 format. Resolution: 1ms. Range: 0ms to 127ms. Default: 5ms.

digital_physical_map.-1: Soft-stop fall time in ms using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: READ_VIN
fields.description: Read input voltage telemetry. LINEAR11 format. Range: 0V to 80V. Accuracy: ±3%.

digital_physical_map.-1: Input voltage reading in Volts using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: READ_VOUT
fields.description: Read output voltage telemetry. LINEAR16 format with exponent -9. Accuracy: ±1.5% for VOUT 2V-5.5V, ±2% for VOUT 0.5V-2V.

digital_physical_map.-1: Output voltage reading: VOUT = VALUE * 2^(-9) V

fields.name: READ_IOUT
fields.description: Read output current telemetry. ULINEAR11 format. Accuracy: ±3% at 100% load, ±4% at 50% load, ±12% at 20% load (TA = 25°C).

digital_physical_map.-1: Output current reading in Amps using ULINEAR11 format

fields.name: READ_TEMPERATURE
fields.description: Read junction temperature telemetry. LINEAR11 format. Range: -50°C to 150°C. Resolution: 1°C. Accuracy: ±5°C.

digital_physical_map.-1: Junction temperature reading in °C using LINEAR11 format

fields.name: READ_IIN
fields.description: Read input current telemetry. ULINEAR11 format. Accuracy varies with load.

digital_physical_map.-1: Input current reading in Amps using ULINEAR11 format

fields.name: READ_PIN
fields.description: Read input power telemetry. ULINEAR11 format. Accuracy: ±3% at 100% load, ±4% at 50% load, ±9% at 20% load.

digital_physical_map.-1: Input power reading in Watts using ULINEAR11 format

fields.name: READ_POUT
fields.description: Read output power telemetry. ULINEAR11 format. Accuracy: ±3% at 100% load, ±4% at 50% load, ±9% at 20% load.

digital_physical_map.-1: Output power reading in Watts using ULINEAR11 format

fields.name: READ_DUTY_CYCLE
fields.description: Read duty cycle telemetry. LINEAR11 format. Range: 0% to 100%.

digital_physical_map.-1: Duty cycle reading in % using LINEAR11 format
